item.title: Building a Dummy Agentic System and My Naive Lens on AI Agents
item.description: References, Credits and Inspirations: Beyond the Dev-UI: How to Build an Interface for an ADK agent Google Agent Development Kit (ADK) The Anatomy of Tool Calling - A deep dive into Python functions and tool calling. How to Build an Agent - [Agent building from AMP] Questions : Everyone is talking about “Agents” right now. It feels like we went from “AI that writes poems” to “AI that fixes my code” overnight.
